  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hoverable, Navigatable

    EditorNewFileDialog, EditorOpenFileDialog

    public class AlignedModal
extends Modal
    A Modal that can be auto-aligned using VerticalAlignment and HorizontalAlignment
